session.title: Session
session.description: A session is required to access to read-and-write API endpoints

id.description: JSON web token for the session

account.description: The account associated with the session

is_2fa_active.description: Whether 2-factor authentication is active for this account or not

ignore_content.description: When duplicating a site it allows to duplicate only the schema

site.title: Site
site.description: A site represents a specific DatoCMS administrative area

last_data_change_at.description: Specifies the last time when a change of data occurred

deactivated.description: Status of site according to billing situation

links.title: Simulate
links.description: Simulate costs for a new subscription

ignore_content.description: Skip compatibility checks on content (number of records and uploads)

active.description: Whether this plan is active or legacy

custom_domain.description: Whether custom domain can be enabled or not

users.description: Number of users that can be invited

traffic_bytes.description: Amount of asset data transferred between our Asset CDN and GraphQL Content Delivery API and content consumers

api_calls.description: The number of requests made to both our Content Management and Content Delivery APIs

access_tokens.description: The number of different API tokens you can generate, each which different permissions

item_locking.description: Whether collaboration features are enabled or not

advanced_media_area.description: Whether built-in image editor is enabled or not

sso.description: Whether Single Sign-On feature is enabled or not

version_history.description: Whether version history can be enabled or not

otp.description: Whether two-factor authentication can be enabled or not

links.title: Create a new site transfer request
Simulate accept
links.description: Simulate costs for accepting a site transfer request

site_transfer.title: Site transfer request
site_transfer.description: A request to transfer a site to another account

site_name.description: Name of the site to transfer

oauth_application.title: OAuth application
oauth_application.description: An OAuth application that allows access to our API from third party services.

job_result.title: Job result
job_result.description: Some API endpoint give results asyncronously, returning the ID of a job

payload.description: JSON API response of the HTTP request

rawHeaders: authorization, content-type, x-site-domain, x-api-version, user-agent, x-session-id
authorization, content-type, x-site-domain, x-api-version, user-agent, x-session-id
